Text: BP Capital Energy Equity International Holding LPGood Afternoon Enclosed is a worksheet for BP Capital Energy Equity International Holdings LP This document should be the same as BP Capital Energy Fund LP and BP Capital Energy Equity Fund LP which are industrial masters Please forward executable documents to Mike Larson at BP Capital Stephanie is currently putting together an omnibus confirm for existing trades done last week but these will roll up to the master once it is executed Give me a call with any questions Thanks Max

Panaco IncEnclosed is an ISDA worksheet for Panaco Inc They are very interested as are many right now in getting an ISDA in place that has netting language between financial transactions and physical gas Physical gas is done both at ENA and ENA Upstream Company LLC Can we put together such a document If there are any questions please give me a call Thanks Max

Master Netting MidAmerican Energy CompanyWe would like to get a master netting agreement going with MidAmerican MidAmerican Energy Company Physical Gas with ENA GISB Financial Products with ENA Master Agreement Physical Coal with ENA master coal dated Physical Power with EPMI Power Master Bilateral or Emissions with EPMI SO Allowance Master Outgoing Guaranties mm covering ENA for financial products mm covering EPMI for physical power mm covering ENA for physical coal mm covering ENA for physical gas The contact at MidAmerican is Brian Wiese Give me a call with any questions Thanks Max

KerrMcGee Energy Services CorporationEnclosed is a worksheet for KerrMcGee Energy Services Corporation This worksheet reflects terms to be amended to the current ISDA with the customer The credit terms for Enron will remain exactly the same Please forward our drafted amendment to ME Booker at KerrMcGee with a copy to me Thanks Max

Master Netting Forest Oil CorpIm helping Jay out with this one and another that Ill send to you Forest Oil Relationship Forest Oil Corporation No master agreements Physical Gas with ENA Upstream Company LLC GISB and GTCs Physical Gas with ENA GTC Financial Products with ENA GTC Crude and other with ERAC GTC Guaranties Outgoing mm covering ENA and ERAC for benefit of Forest Oil Corporation Covers physical delivery and MTM for natural gas and crude products Producers Marketing Ltd Physical Gas with ECC master Guaranties Incoming mm CAD from Forest Oil Corporation for benefit of ECC Covering physical gas MTM Outgoing mm CAD from Enron Corp covering ECC Covers physical gas MTM
Master Netting Western ResourcesGood Morning With Jay out this week Im forwarding the Western Resources Inc relationship If there are any questions please give me a call Thanks Max Sonnonstine x

Total Gas Electric Master PhysicalEnclosed is a worksheet for Total Gas Electric Suzanne mentioned she would be working on the drafting of this document When a draft is ready please provide me with a copy Many Thanks Max Sonnonstine x

J Aron Master FirmEnclosed is a Master Firm worksheet for J Aron This agreement is between ECC and J Aron There appears to be no physical gas traded with ENA Give me a call with any questions Thanks Max Sonnonstine x

Independent Production Kennedy Oil Cc Good Afternoon The following two counterparties are requesting a netting agreement with ENA Kennedy Oil and Independent Production Company Inc The netting agreement should cover physical sales and purchases and MTM These are both standard netting agreements not master netting Both companies sell us gas under a first purchaser agreement and or GTCs and will begin buying back gas For Independent the contract is and for Kennedy I have contact names and phone numbers if you need them Give me a call with any questions Thanks Max Sonnonstine

FW GISBGood Morning Enclosed is a draft of a GISB for Utility Resource Solutions LP They have done some small physical volumes secured by a prepay but are interested in establishing a more developed relationship As such they want to enter into a GISB with Enron This is their copy forwarded through Jay Reitmeyer Please review and advise what needs to be done if anything to get this executed Thanks Max Sonnonstine x

RE Enfolio agreement Cc NonPrivilegedpst A couple of thoughts regarding the redline Scope of Agreement judgement resulting from this Agreement shall be made only from the revenues received from Customers natural gas system operations I need to rereview the financials to determine how much the gas system operations is worth Because of this clause mm in credit may be too much Once I can get on the net Ill review Scope of Agreement Furthermore in accordance with the Colorado Springs City Charter performance of Customers obligationsexpressly subject to appropriation of funds for such purpose by the City Council In case we are in a position to call for margin what is the process of getting it Do they have to get permission authorization from the city etc Tyrell had asked me the process how we call and what we accept for margin but Id like to understand the ease andor difficulty of receiving margin from them We may never hit the threshold but if we do and we cant get margin we may have a big problem Gerald I assume youre ok with the arbitration clauses Give me a call if anyone wants to discuss further thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday September PM To Sonnonstine Max Cc Harrison Tyrell Subject FW Enfolio agreement Max Please see attached redline from Colorado Springs They revised the Collateral limits in Section Let me know your thoughts Original Message From Harrison Tyrell Sent Friday September AM To Nemec Gerald Subject FW Enfolio agreement Ill follow with a call Original Message From Marcus Eller mailto Sent Wednesday September AM To Harrison Tyrell Subject Enfolio agreement The attached contract highlights the changes we have discussed The only other matter is the rewriting of the legal opinion Please look this over and we can discuss Marcus CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This electronic mail message and attachments if any contain information which is PRIVILEGED CONFIDENTIAL ATTORNEYCLIENT COMMUNICATIONS andor ATTORNEY WORK PRODUCT This confidential and legally privileged information is intended only for the use of the individuals to whom the electronic mail message is addressed or copied as shown above

RE Enfolio agreement CSU Cc NonPrivilegedpst Afternoon I was able to go through Colorado Springs financials but was unable to distinguish between natural gas system operations and the general utility outside of book value of the various gas electric and water plants As such if we are unable to acquire statements for the gas system itself I dont think we can agree to CSUs redline of Scope of Agreement point below Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday September PM To Sonnonstine Max Subject RE Enfolio agreement Max The agreement calls for them to provide to ENA certification that they have set aside special funds to meet their payment obligations to ENA under this agreement A letter from the mayor or city manager indicating such budget approvals are sufficient To the extent they dont provide this an Early Termination event occurs We can still call for collateral in accordance with Section if they dont meet the thresholds The item added in your Sentence below does concern me This seems to be a floated revenue system and I am not sure how we get comfortable that the revenues will be there I need to review these additions with Colorado Springs because it is not clear to me how they think such provisions operate in the context of the existing language concerning the budget certification requirements We probably need to get on a conference call with them I am probably OK with the arbitration provision depending on how the other items turn out Tyrell do you want to set something up a call with Marcus and his attorney to discuss these issues Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Tuesday September PM To Nemec Gerald Cc Harrison Tyrell Subject RE Enfolio agreement A couple of thoughts regarding the redline Scope of Agreement judgement resulting from this Agreement shall be made only from the revenues received from Customers natural gas system operations I need to rereview the financials to determine how much the gas system operations is worth Because of this clause mm in credit may be too much Once I can get on the net Ill review Scope of Agreement Furthermore in accordance with the Colorado Springs City Charter performance of Customers obligationsexpressly subject to appropriation of funds for such purpose by the City Council In case we are in a position to call for margin what is the process of getting it Do they have to get permission authorization from the city etc Tyrell had asked me the process how we call and what we accept for margin but Id like to understand the ease andor difficulty of receiving margin from them We may never hit the threshold but if we do and we cant get margin we may have a big problem Gerald I assume youre ok with the arbitration clauses Give me a call if anyone wants to discuss further thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday September PM To Sonnonstine Max Cc Harrison Tyrell Subject FW Enfolio agreement Max Please see attached redline from Colorado Springs They revised the Collateral limits in Section Let me know your thoughts Original Message From Harrison Tyrell Sent Friday September AM To Nemec Gerald Subject FW Enfolio agreement Ill follow with a call Original Message From Marcus Eller mailto Sent Wednesday September AM To Harrison Tyrell Subject Enfolio agreement The attached contract highlights the changes we have discussed The only other matter is the rewriting of the legal opinion Please look this over and we can discuss Marcus CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This electronic mail message and attachments if any contain information which is PRIVILEGED message is addressed or copied as shown above

RE Texex Energy PartnersJeff I am faxing the LC and amendments to you this morning to Sara to what number shall I send this to thanks Max Original Message From St Clair Carol Sent Friday January PM To Sonnonstine Max Cc Brackett Debbie R Rohauer Tanya Hodge Jeffrey T Shackleton Sara Subject RE Texex Energy Partners Importance High Max Please send to Sara Shackleton and Jeff Hodge copy of the LC and all amendments Tanya and Debbie Is Monica working on sending us copies of all of the LCs that expire this month Carol St Clair EB phone fax cell phone pager home fax Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Friday January PM To Hodge Jeffrey T Mellencamp Lisa St Clair Carol Subject Texex Energy Partners Good Afternoon Credit has an issue with Texex Energy Partners that you should be aware of We received an amendment of an LC that reduces the coverage amount to mm and extends the expiry date to It covers physical MTM which we are in the money approx mm I assume that we are not performing on these contracts some go out to but Texex has not terminated I believe we should call Texex to extend the LC to protect the value of these contracts and if they refuse we terminate and draw on the current LC Do you buy into this strategy Please advise at your convenience Thanks Max Sonnonstine x
